name: Seriate
description:
Sort your emails using text embeddings!
Is reading your email slow or boring? Does it just not involve enough machine learning? This extension gets text embeddings for your emails (using the OpenAI API), and then *seriates* them: that is, it organizes them in a linear order that keeps similar emails together.
If one dimension isn't enough, you can also see your emails in 2D using UMAP.
Credit to Gwern for suggesting this: https://www.lesswrong.com/posts/u2ww8yKp9xAB6qzcr/if-you-re-not-sure-how-to-sort-a-list-or-grid-seriate-it
